title: different.tan — different.tan
text: different.tan: R code analysis  vehicle emissions remote sensing system (VERSS)  data

title: different.tan — different.tan
text: different.tan initially developed part  work series projects collecting  analyzing EDAR data, many also interest using similar (VERSS) methods. name 'different.tan' refers Don Stedman, pioneer  field, died 2016:  [DON]

title: different.tan — different.tan
text: gratefully acknowledge huge contributions R Core Team  numerous contributors developing maintaining R: R Development Core Team (2011). R: language environment  statistical computing. R Foundation Statistical Computing,  Vienna, Austria. ISBN 3-900051-07-0, URL http://www.R-project.org/. Ropkins, K., DeFries, T.H., Pope, F., Green, D.C., Kemper, J., Kishan, S.,  Fuller, G.W., Li, H., Sidebottom, J., Crilley, L.R. Kramer, L. (2017).  Evaluation EDAR vehicle emissions remote sensing technology. Science  Total Environment, 609, pp.1464-1474. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2017.07.137 Ghaffarpasand, O., Beddows, D.C., Ropkins, K. Pope, F.D. (2020). Real-world  assessment vehicle air pollutant emissions subset vehicle type, fuel  EURO class: New findings recent UK EDAR field campaigns, implications  emissions restricted zones. Science Total Environment, 734, p.139416. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2020.139416 Ghaffarpasand, O., Ropkins, K., Beddows, D.C. Pope, F.D. (2022). Detecting high  emitting vehicle subsets using emission remote sensing systems. Science Total  Environment, p.159814.https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2022.159814

title: different.tan — different.tan
text: Karl Ropkins, Francis Pope, David Beddows, Omid Ghaffarpasand

title: import_featdata — import_featdata
text: Function imports data Denver FEAT data archive (See ).

title: import_featdata — import_featdata
text: featdata Character, data set name (see ) simplify.names Logical, TRUE, simplifies column names  found data set converting lower case changing underscores dots. ... Currently ignored.

title: import_featdata — import_featdata
text: import_featdata attempts match featdata , found,  returns data.frame. function uses base R code foreign::read.dbf download,  read tidy data. .=TRUE argument applied reading data ,  example, date time columns imported character vectors rather factors.

title: import_featdata — import_featdata
text: function imports data  FEAT data archive.

title: import_featdata — import_featdata
text: -development: code may subject significant change; Currently,  data sets can downloaded FEAT archive. (See Details list  data sets available using import_featdata; please check main archive,  FEAT data listed .)

title: import_featdata — import_featdata
text: foreign package read.dbf: R Core Team (2022). _foreign: Read Data Stored 'Minitab', 'S', 'SAS', 'SPSS', 'Stata', 'Systat', 'Weka', 'dBase', ..._. R package version 0.8-82,  <https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=foreign>. general information FEAT: D.H. Stedman G.. Bishop. Measuring Emissions Passing Cars,   Acc. Chem. Res., 29:489-495, 1996. D.. Burgard, G.. Bishop, R.S. Stadtmuller, T.R. Dalton D.H. Stedman,  Spectroscopy Applied -Road Mobile Source Emissions. Appl. Spectrosc., 60:5:135A-148A, 2006. , specific campaigns/data sets, please reference using study  reference(s), listed associated DOI(s) Details .

title: plot_Pareto — plot_Pareto
text: -development plots functions intended use VERSS data.

title: plot_Pareto — plot_Pareto
code: plot_Pareto(   y,   groups = NULL,   cond = NULL,   data = NULL,   x = NULL,   ...,   panel = panel.ParetoPlot,   drop.nas = TRUE,   Pareto = "normal.cum.Pareto" )

title: plot_Pareto — plot_Pareto
text: y (numeric vector), measurements plotted PartoPlot Y-axis terms. VERSS  analysis typically emission measurements passing vehicles, can  data-series frequency occurrence y interest. groups (optional) sub-sampling term grouping measurements within plot. cond (optional) sub-sampling term plotting data separate panels. data (optional, data.frame similar), source y, groups, cond, etc. x (optional, number vector), default, index y values, lowest  highest. ... Passed lattice loa plot functions (used possible). panel lattice plot argument drop.nas Return NAs plotting. Pareto (Character) Pareto plot type, options: 'Pareto' standard Pareto;  'cum.Pareto' cumulative Pareto; 'normal.cum.Pareto' cumulative Pareto expressed  proportion; , 'percent.cum.Pareto' cumulative Pareto expressed  percentage.

title: plot_Pareto — plot_Pareto
text: lattice object plot.

title: Pareto Enrichment Plots — plot_ParetoEnrichment
text: [added]

title: Pareto Enrichment Plots — plot_ParetoEnrichment
code: plot_ParetoEnrichment(   x,   y = NULL,   cut = 0.8,   data = NULL,   ...,   min.bin = 1,   drop.nas = TRUE,   order = FALSE,   level.nmax = NULL )

title: Pareto Enrichment Plots — plot_ParetoEnrichment
